FuncDef: This command associates a transit AA subscriber IP or prefix policy to the service. The transit policy must be defined prior to associating the policy with a SAP in theconfig>app-assure>group>transit-ip-policyortransit-prefix-policycontext.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a transit IP policy ID. Values-1 to 65535.
Specifies a transit prefix policy ID. Values-1 to 65535.
